main.title: eSIM cards for travel and business

hero.title: Affordable mobile internet with eSIM
hero.subtitle: Easily and quickly share mobile internet with other devices using eSIM
hero.card1_text: Activation in 2 minutes via QR code. No office visits or waiting — connection is available immediately
hero.card2_text: Personal, work, and travel plans — all in one smartphone. Convenient switching in just a few taps
hero.card3_text: No need to waste time on bots or AI. Trust professionals — our team will instantly solve any connection issues!
hero.card4_text: eSIM cannot be lost or damaged. If your phone is lost, the number can easily be transferred to another device
hero.card5_text: Large data packages at accessible prices. No hidden fees, overpayments, or unnecessary services
hero.card6_text: No plastic SIM cards — less waste and more care for the environment
